headline: UDR (UDR): Evaluating Valuation After Leadership Shakeup and President’s Resignation
summary: If you follow UDR (NYSE:UDR), you probably took notice when the company announced that Joseph D. Fisher, President and Chief Investment Officer, and until recently, Chief Financial Officer, would be stepping down. Fisher's resignation marks a reset at the top, with Chairman and CEO Tom Toomey assuming additional duties as President. Leadership moves like this almost always catch the market’s attention, and UDR is no exception, especially given Fisher’s longstanding role shaping the company’s...
